fn.p: Edited by: Francois Villinger, University of Louisiana at Lafayette, United States
Reviewed by: Juan-Carlos Saiz, Instituto Nacional de Investigación y Tecnología Agraria y Alimentaria (INIA), Spain; Shannan Rossi, The University of Texas Medical Branch at Galveston, United States
This article was submitted to Virology, a section of the journal Frontiers in Microbiology
